baseURL.description: Hostname (and path) to the root, e.g. http://spf13.com/

bind.description: Interface to which the server will bind (default "127.0.0.1")

buildFuture.description: Include content with publishdate in the future

cacheDir.description: Filesystem path to cache directory. Defaults: $TMPDIR/hugo_cache/

cleanDestinationDir.description: Remove files from destination not found in static directories

destination.description: Filesystem path to write files to

disableBrowserError.description: Do not show build errors in the browser

disableKinds.description: Disable different kind of pages (home, RSS etc.)

disableLiveReload.description: Watch without enabling live browser reload on rebuild

enableGitInfo.description: Add Git revision, date and author info to the pages

forceSyncStatic.description: Copy all files when static is changed

gc.description: Enable to run some cleanup tasks (remove unused cache files) after the build

liveReloadPort.description: Port for live reloading (i.e. 443 in HTTPS proxy situations) (default -1)

logFile.description: Log File path (if set, logging enabled automatically)

meminterval.description: Interval to poll memory usage (requires --memstats), valid time units are "ns", "us" (or "Âµs"), "ms", "s", "m", "h". (default "100ms")

memstats.description: Log memory usage to this file

minify.description: Minify any supported output format (HTML, XML etc.)

navigateToChanged.description: Navigate to changed content file on live browser reload

noChmod.description: Don't sync permission mode of files

noTimes.description: Don't sync modification time of files

path-warnings.description: Print warnings on duplicate target paths etc

port.description: Port on which the server will listen (default 1313)

renderToDisk.description: Render to Destination path (default is render to memory & serve from there)

source.description: Filesystem path to read files relative from

templateMetricsHints.description: Calculate some improvement hints when combined with --templateMetrics

trace.description: write trace to file (not useful in general)

watch.description: Watch filesystem for changes and recreate as needed (default true)
